name: WKInterfaceSKScene
desc: A visual WatchKit element that displays a SpriteKit scene.

items.name: func presentScene(SKScene, transition: SKTransition)
items.desc: Transitions from the current scene to a new scene.

items.name: var preferredFramesPerSecond: Int
items.desc: The animation frame rate that the interface uses to render its scene.

items.name: var isPaused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the view’s scene animations are paused.

items.name: func texture(from: SKNode) -> SKTexture?
items.desc: Renders the contents of a node tree and returns the rendered image as a SpriteKit texture.

items.name: func texture(from: SKNode, crop: CGRect) -> SKTexture?
items.desc: Renders a portion of a node’s contents and returns the rendered image as a SpriteKit texture.
